findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The updateEmissionRate() function could invoke massUpdatePools() function, which can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: Owner privileges: Owner can change startBlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the start block.

findings.title: Owner privileges: Owner can change the operator of the referral contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the operator of the referral contract.

findings.title: Owner privileges: Owner can change the referral commission rate
findings.description: The owner has the capability to modify the referral commission rate.

findings.title: Owner privileges: Operator can change dev and fee addresses
findings.description: The operator has the privilege to change the developer and fee addresses.
